SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM COMMENTS WHERE COMMENT_REF = #{commentRef}

SELECT ID, FORUM_ID, USER_NAME, CONTENT, COMMENT_REF, COMMENT_LEVEL, COMMENT_CNT, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC, HATE_CNT ASC, ID DESC ) AS SEQ,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HATE_CNT DESC, LIKE_CNT ASC, ID DESC ) AS SEQ,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID DESC) AS SEQ,
ID, FORUM_ID, USER_NAME, CONTENT, COMMENT_REF, COMMENT_LEVEL, COMMENT_CNT, REG_DATE FROM COMMENTS WHERE FORUM_ID = #{forumId} AND COMMENT_REF = 0 ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
